queryMap.query: SELECT GRP_CD FROM TBDA_GRP_CD WHERE GRP_CD = ?
SELECT '0' AS CHK , GRP_CD , GRP_NM , RMK , DEL_YN , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM FROM TBDA_GRP_CD WHERE DEL_YN = ? AND GRP_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(?, GRP_NM) || '%' ORDER BY GRP_CD
SELECT CD FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = ? AND CD = ?

SELECT '0' AS CHK , A.GRP_CD , A.CD , A.CD_NM , A.RMK , A.DEL_YN , A.INST_ID , A.INST_DTM , A.UPDT_ID , A.UPDT_DTM , B.GRP_NM FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD A , TBDA_GRP_CD B WHERE A.GRP_CD = B.GRP_CD AND A.GRP_CD = ?

INSERT INTO TBDA_GRP_CD ( GRP_CD , GRP_NM , DEL_YN , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM , RMK ) VALUES ( ? -- GRP_CD , ? -- GRP_NM , ? -- DEL_YN , ? -- INST_ID , SYSDATE -- INST_DTM , ? -- UPDT_ID , SYSDATE -- UPDT_DTM , ? -- RMK )
UPDATE TBDA_GRP_CD SET GRP_NM = ? , DEL_YN = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE , RMK = ? WHERE GRP_CD = ?
UPDATE TBDA_GRP_CD SET DEL_YN = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE GRP_CD = ?

INSERT INTO TBDA_SPEC_CD ( GRP_CD , CD , CD_NM , DEL_YN , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM , RMK ) VALUES ( ? -- GRP_CD , ? -- CD , ? -- CD_NM , ? -- DEL_YN , ? -- INST_ID , SYSDATE -- INST_DTM , ? -- UPDT_ID , SYSDATE -- UPDT_DTM , ? -- RMK )
UPDATE TBDA_SPEC_CD SET CD_NM = ? , DEL_YN = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE , RMK = ? WHERE GRP_CD = ? AND CD = ?
DELETE FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = ? AND CD = NVL(?, CD)
